headline: Amgen (AMGN) Announces Positive Results for Phase 3 Study of Bemarituzumab
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the 10 Best Dip Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. On June 30, Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) announced positive topline results for an important phase 3 study of Bemarituzumab for certain stomach cancers. The company announced that the Phase 3 FORTITUDE-101 trial met its primary endpoint. The Bemarituzumab plus chemotherapy significantly improved […]
